parameters.name: MonitorId
parameters.description:
The ID of the monitoring session.

>  You can obtain the monitoring session ID from the response parameter MonitorId of the [CreateLiveStreamMonitor](~~2848129~~) operation. If you leave this parameter empty, the data of all monitoring sessions is returned.

parameters.name: OrderRule
parameters.description:
The sorting order of monitoring sessions. Valid values:

*   0: Monitoring sessions are sorted by status.
*   1: Monitoring sessions are sorted by start time in descending order.
*   2: Monitoring sessions are sorted by start time in ascending order.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of monitoring sessions to return per page.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the monitoring session. Valid values:

*   1: Monitoring
*   0: Unmonitored
